</#if>
P.O.Box: 7992 Dubai-UAE
Telephone: +971 52 99 11 111
Email: info@localstorage.ae
Website: www.localstorage.ae
Agreement # ${inputData.customerDetails.contractName}

tr.td: LOCAL SELF STORAGE FZ-LLC Company, with it’s registered address at _Dubai Production City P.O. Box: 7992_, Dubai, United Arab Emirates (hereinafter called “Company”)
WHEREAS, the Company provides self-storage facility at the Premise located in Dubai Production City

AND WHEREAS, under the terms of this Agreement dated ${inputData.printDate}, the Occupier has taken Unit Numbers as specified in the Particulars below (hereinafter referred to as the "Storage Unit(s)”) for the period starting ${inputData.contractStartDate} and ending ${inputData.contractEndDate} (“Term”).
The Particulars below along with the General Terms & Conditions shall together constitute this Agreement.

b.u: PARTICULARS: Storage Unit and Payment Details

tr.td: ${inputData.customerDetails.customerName}
${inputData.customerDetails.customerMobileNo}
${inputData.customerDetails.customerPhoneNo}
${inputData.customerDetails.customerEmail}
${inputData.customerDetails.customerAddress}
1. Mode of Payment for the Storage Unit:
1.1 The Occupier shall select whether they will be opting for Automatic Recurring Online Payment or Manual Payment.

Option to be ticked:
Automatic Recurring Payment
Manual Payment
1.2 Each payment option shall be subject to specific terms and be fulfilled by the Occupier. In all cases, One (1) Month Security Deposit shall be payable by the Occupier.
1.3 The different modes of payment and the specific terms are as follows.

a) Automatic Recurring Online Payment by Credit Card: Payment shall be deducted on a monthly basis as per the card details provided by the Occupier and the subscription shall be renewed automatically as per the terms of this Agreement. Until the subscription is cancelled fifteen (15) calendar days prior to the expiry date and in compliance with the Checkout and Handover Section 4 of this Particulars.

b) Manual Payment by Cheque, Bank Transfer, Credit Card and/or Cash: Payment shall be made either for the entire Term or on a monthly basis for the use of the Storage Unit(s), if the Occupier is making the payment through cheque, bank transfer or by cash.

The Mode of Payment:
Cash Cheque Bank Transfer Credit Card

The Occupier is required to select whether they are making the payment for the Term in advance and in full or on a monthly basis.
Entire Payment Monthly Payment
1.4 The payments are required to be made three (3) working days prior to the due date.
1.5 Cheques are to be issued in the name of: LOCAL SELF STORAGE FZ-LLC Company

1.6 For bank transfer, the Occupier is required to provide their name, invoice number as issued by the Company and Storage Unit No. in the reference while making the bank transfer in order for the Company to be able to verify the payment. Failure to verify the payment shall result in the overlocking of the Storage Unit and delayed payment penalties. Within twenty-four (24) hours of the bank transfer, the Occupier is required to send an email to the Company with their name, the Storage Unit No, and the proof of payment (e.g. screenshot and/or bank transfer advice) attached to the email for the Company’s records.

1.7 Payments made by the Occupier shall under no circumstances be refunded for any reason, including but not limited to, the Occupier failing to use the Storage Unit, vacating the Storage Unit, and/or handing over the Storage Unit to the Company prior to the end of the Term.

2. Padlock: The Occupier shall be provided with a Padlock and Key to be used for their Storage Unit, for a non-refundable charge payable to the Company. If the Occupier loses the Padlock and/or Key, they shall pay charges to the Company for breaking into the Storage Unit and for the replacement Padlock and Key.
3. Cancellation: The Occupier may cancel the Agreement prior to the end of the Term by giving the written notice as provided for below:
a. Agreement of 1 month requires the Occupier to give a written cancellation notice of at least 10 days prior to expiry date of the Agreement.
b. Agreement of up to 3 months requires the Occupier to give a written cancellation notice of at least 15 days prior to expiry date of the Agreement.
c. Agreement between 4 to 6 months requires the Occupier to give a written cancelation notice of at least 30 days prior to the expiry date of the Agreement.
d. Agreement longer than 6 months requires the Occupier to give a written cancelation notice of at least 60 days prior to expiry date of the Agreement.

4. Checkout & Handover: The Occupier is required to handover the Storage Unit to the Company representative in person after the inspection by the Company representative and submission of the checkout/handover form on the expiry date of the Agreement and/or at the time of vacating the Storage Unit. Further, the Occupier shall also comply with the requirements under Clause 9 of the General Terms & Conditions. Unless the requirements under this Section 4 is fully complied with, the Agreement shall be deemed to be valid and continuing and the Occupier continue to be liable to pay the rental and any other charges as applicable.

5. Security Deposit: The Occupier undertakes to pay a security deposit equivalent to the value of One Month’s Payment. The security deposit shall be refunded, after the deduction of any cost towards damages and other outstanding dues. The refund cheque shall be issued within fourteen (14) days of the checkout date. If the Security Deposit refund cheque is not collected and/or encashed within six (6) months from the checkout date, then the Security Deposit shall be forfeited.

6. Late Payment Charges: The Occupier undertakes to make all payments on or before the due date and if there is any delay, then the Occupier shall pay Late Payment Charges of Two Hundred and Fifty Dirhams (AED 250) per week to the Company, in addition to the rental of the Storage Unit until all outstanding payments have been fully settled.

7. If the Occupier defaults in making any payment, then the Company retains the right to close the access to and/or use of the Storage Unit until all the dues are settled to the satisfaction of the Company.
8. The Storage Unit rate per Sqft is subject to change at the sole discretion of the Company as per market standards.

9. Should a corporate entity be the Occupier or an Individual, in both instances, the person signing this document must be an authorized signatory on behalf of the Occupier. The authorized signatory should be an individual whose name appears on the trade license, or they are required to produce a notarized proxy signed by the trade license owner authorizing them to sign on the Occupier’s behalf.
10. Access to the Storage Unit shall be as per the agreed timings which are subject to change at the sole discretion of the Company.
11. The Occupier undertakes not to make or permit to be made any alterations or additions to the Storage Unit without obtaining the prior written consent of the Company.
12. These Particulars shall at all times be read with the attached General Terms and Conditions (“GTC”) and the GTC will also be available online on the official website of the Company.

13. The GTC are subject to change from time to time at the sole discretion of the Company, and it is the responsibility of the Occupier to check for any updates on the website. Any change to the GTC as published on the website shall be effective immediately without any notice.

td.b: The Occupier agrees to the following terms and conditions

tr.td: The Particulars, these GTC and the attachments together constitute the Agreement.
Each of the following expressions used in this Agreement shall have the meaning assigned hereunder.
"Appendix" means any attachment referred to in this Agreement;

"Common Area and Facilities" means those areas and facilities, in and on the Premises that are not given by the Company to the Occupier or to any other Occupiers on the Premises to be used for storage purpose and which are now or hereafter provided by the Company for common use by the Occupier and other Occupiers on the Premise. Common Area and Facilities shall include but not be limited to all roads, gardens, walls, designated car parks, passages, entrances, halls, toilets, stairways, lifts, and other grounds and amenities which the Company may from time to time provide and make available.

"House Rules" means the rules and regulations prescribed by the Company relating to the management, functioning and care of the Storage Unit and Common Areas used by the Occupier, as well as the conduct of the Occupiers on the Premises. (Appendix: 1)
"Party" means either the Company or the Occupier as the context admits and Parties means both of them.

"Payments" means the amount payable for the use of the Storage Unit, Security Deposit, Late Payment Charge, any penalties payable and/or any other payments which may become due and payable by the Occupier to the Company in accordance with this Agreement.
"Premises" means the entire area of the storage facility of the Company in _______;
"Storage Period" means the Start Date and End Date as specified in the Particulars.
"Storage Unit" means the storage unit and/or any storage area as specified in the Particulars.

The Company hereby grants the Storage Unit to the Occupier for the Term of this Agreement for storage subject to all the conditions stipulated, and the Occupier undertakes to comply with the conditions herein.
The Occupier hereby undertakes as follows:

a) The Occupier has read and understood all the terms and conditions of the Agreement and undertakes to abide by them at all times. The Occupier understands that the Storage Unit is part of the Company’s Premises where the Occupier’s rights may be affected if he fails to conform to the terms and conditions of this Agreement.

b) If the Occupier fails to vacate the Storage Unit(s) before or by the expiry date of the Agreement, the Occupier shall automatically be charged additional monthly rent(s) for every delayed month plus an administrative fee of Two Hundred and Fifty Dirhams (AED 250). For avoidance of doubt, these aforementioned additional charges along with any other outstanding payments must be paid to the Company before being permitted to vacate the Storage Unit(s).
c) The Occupiers shall use the elevators at their own risk and the Company shall not be held liable for the operation or malfunction of the elevators on the Premises.

d) If the Occupier is in default of a payment or breaches the terms of this Agreement, the Company has unconditional right to stop the usage of the Storage Unit(s) by the Occupier. In such an event, they shall be liable to pay a mandatory monthly fee of Two Hundred and Fifty Dirhams (AED 250) for rooms under 200 sqft. and Five Hundred Dirhams (AED 500) for rooms between 200 to 310 sqft. This monthly fee shall accrue and be charged until the full payment is made or the breach has been remedied by the Occupier. For avoidance of doubt, the payments under this clause are in addition to all other payments due and payable by the Occupier under the terms of this Agreement.
e- The Occupier shall adhere to any inspection protocol and grant access to the relevant authorities to their Storage Unit(s) as and when required for inspection purposes.

f- The Occupier shall refrain from storing any precious goods and metals, such as, but not limited to gold and silver, paintings, artefacts, any jewelry item and/or cash in the Storage Unit. In the event, that the Occupier stores such items in their Storage Unit, the Company shall not be held responsible for the damage, loss, or theft of any such items in any manner whatsoever.

g- The Company shall not accept the storage of hazardous goods of any nature whatsoever. Failure to comply with this shall result in an initial penalty charge of Twenty-Five Thousand Dirhams (AED 25,000) and legal action.

h- Storage of items prohibited by the applicable laws of UAE is a criminal offence and Company shall not be responsible in any manner whatsoever. Any Occupier storing items prohibited by UAE Law shall be fully liable for any consequences and/or liability. For avoidance of doubt, the Company shall assist the authorities in any investigation and/or legal action against any Occupier who is storing goods which are prohibited by UAE Law.
5.1 Assignment by the Company: The Company shall be free (without the Occupier’s consent) to assign or transfer the whole or any part of the Premises to any party as the Company deems fit.

5.2 Assignment by the Occupier: The Occupier shall not assign, transfer, part with the possession of, sublet or grant any license whatsoever or otherwise deal with, or dispose of the Storage Unit or any part thereof to any other party.

6.1 In the event of irreparable loss, the Company shall provide a blanket insurance cover which has a maximum limit of up to Five Hundred Dirhams (AED 500) per sqft. If the value of the damaged or lost goods is less than the maximum limit, then the Occupier shall only be entitled to claim for the actual value of goods. If the limit of AED 500 per sqft is considered to be insufficient by the Occupier, then the Occupier at their own cost may acquire separate insurance policies to cover such goods stored in their Storage Unit(s). The Occupier shall provide a copy of any such insurance policies acquired to the Company for their record.
6.2 The Company shall not take any responsibility to cover any goods of the Occupier that are above the value of AED 500 per sqft as specified in Clause 6.1.
6.3 The Occupier shall obtain adequate insurance to cover any physical harm to themselves or any related persons and/or any third-party in the process of using the Storage Unit.
Notwithstanding anything to the contrary contained herein, the Agreement shall be automatically terminated if;
a - The Occupier commits a breach of any it’s covenants, obligations and undertaking herein or defaults in complying with any of the conditions of this Lease; or

b - The Occupier goes into liquidation or makes an assignment of the benefit of or enters into an arrangement or composition with creditors or stops payments and other charges specified in the Particulars above.

Then without prejudice to any rights and remedies available to the Company under the Agreement and in law, this Agreement will stand automatically terminated without the need for any Court Judgment or notification or any other legal procedure.
If the Agreement is terminated due to any reason of the Occupier’s default and non- compliance with any of its obligations stipulated in this Agreement or any Appendices then:

a - any alterations to the Company’s work or modifications affected at the request of the Occupier or required to accommodate the Occupier’s requirements shall be re-instated to it’s former specifications by contractors employed by the Company, the cost for which shall be borne by the Occupier.

b - In the event that Agreement is terminated under Clause 7, and the Occupier is absconding or fails to make payments due for a period of three (3) months or more, then the Occupier unconditionally acknowledges and undertakes that the Company has the right to enter the Storage Unit and dispose off any goods found inside the Storage Unit in any manner whatsoever as deemed fit by the Company, including but not limited to, selling the goods and/or destroying them. The Occupier irrevocably waives off any and all rights to bring forth a claim against the Company in the event of the Company exercising its rights under this Clause 8 (b).

c - Exercise of the rights under Clause 8 (b) above does not absolve the Occupier’s obligations to pay any rental and Payments due under this Agreement. The Company has the right to initiate legal proceedings to recover any such outstanding amounts.

On the expiry, cancellation, and/or termination of this Agreement, the Occupier undertakes to handover the Storage Unit(s) with all its fittings & fixtures in good and readily leasable condition. If the Occupier fails to do so, the Company may reinstate the Storage Unit(s) to its own satisfaction, the cost of which shall solely be borne by and claimed from the Occupier.

The Agreement embodies the entire Agreement between the Parties and supersedes all prior agreements, correspondence, negotiation, discussion, and writings exchanged between the Parties hereto on the subject matter of the Agreement. The Agreement may not be changed and/or modified, in whole or in part, in any manner whatsoever, without a duly executed agreement between the Parties.

Any notice, communication or demand to be given or made by or to the Company or the Occupier pursuant to the Agreement shall be in writing and shall be delivered personally or sent by registered mail, email or by fax to the party due to receive such notice, communication or demand at its address set out in the Particulars of the Agreement (or such other address as either party may advise the other in writing). In the absence of evidence of earlier receipt, any such notice, communication or demand shall be deemed to have been duly given if delivered personally, when left at the address set out in the Particulars of Agreement (or such other address as either party may notify the other in writing), if sent by registered mail and/or email.

b.u: 12. DEFECTS, REPAIR, SERVICES, OR FITTING NOTICE

tr.td: The Occupier must give prompt notice in writing of defects or want of repair in any services to, or fittings in the Premises and of any circumstances likely to cause any danger, risk or hazard to the Premises or any person therein.

The Occupier undertakes to permit the Company, his agents, engineers, contractors, employees at all times, on reasonable notice, to enter the Premise and/or the Storage Unit for carrying out repairs, renovations, maintenance or alterations to the Premises, the Storage Unit(s) or to any part thereof.

Failure of the Company on any occasion to insist upon observance or performance by the Occupier of any covenant or obligation herein contained shall not amount to a waiver of such breach or acceptance of such variation by the Company.

The Occupier undertakes to indemnify the Company against any and all liability, loss, claim, action, cost, expense, damage, injury or fatality caused to any person whomsoever or any property whatsoever whether directly or indirectly arising from:
(a) the defective or damaged condition of any part of the Storage Unit or the Company’s Fit Out.
(b) the spread of fire or smoke or the flow of water from the Storage Unit or any part thereof; or.
(c) the act, omission default, or neglect by the Occupier, its agents, contractors, employees, invitees, licensees, or customers.
The Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the Applicable federal laws of the United Arab Emirates and the laws of the Emirate of Dubai.

The Occupier undertakes to comply with all laws, orders, regulations, or requirements present or future including those affecting the conduct of its business and use of the Storage Unit(s) and Premises and to keep the Company indemnified in the event of any breach by the Occupier.
The Parties agree that any disputes or claims arising out of or relating to this Agreement shall be resolved by the court of relevant jurisdiction in Dubai.
IN WITNESS WHEREOF the Parties executed the Agreement the day and year written above.
Signed by:
Signed by:
For and on behalf of the Company
For and on behalf of the Occupier
Name:
Name:
Designation:
Designation:
Date:
Date:

b.u: APPENDIX 1: House Rules (To be used as a Notice)

tr.td: 1. The Storage Unit shall only be used for the specified use by the Occupier as per the general terms and conditions of the Agreement
2. Wire and steel cutters are not allowed on the Premises
3. Pets are not allowed on the Premises as vermin bait may be present
4. Use of the Storage Unit to be undertaken with consideration for other Occupiers as well; and due courtesy to be extended
5. Please keep all public areas like corridors, entrance, lifts and parking areas litter free
6. The Occupiers are encouraged to report any suspicious or potentially harmful event to the Company immediately.
7. The Occupiers are responsible for locking their Storage Unit and failure to do this resulting in either theft or damage is not the Company’s responsibility.

8. Obstruction of corridors or main entry area wherein other Occupiers are hindered is not allowed and any such items left unattended in the corridors or main entry area may be removed at the Company’s discretion
9. Smoking in the Company Premises is strictly prohibited

10. For the sake of personal safety, the Company recommends that NO children or minors are to be left unattended during a visit to the Premises. The Company shall not be responsible in any manner for any accident or personal injury inside or in the common areas (including the car park) of the Premises
11. The Company shall not take responsibility for accidents or anything similar occurring on the Premises as a result of either negligence or fault of the Occupier
12. Storing perishables in the Storage Units is NOT permitted
13. Storage of dormant charcoal is not allowed as it has spontaneous combustion capability
14. Car batteries and similar items which contain acid/corrosive materials are not permitted for storage
15. Any damages to the Premises as a direct result of the Occupier’s negligence shall be charged to the Occupier
16. The Company reserves the right to open any spaces if either of the following occur
a. Seepage of any substance is observed from under door
b. Any pervading smell or odor is noted emanating from the Storage Unit
c. Fumes of any description are noted emanating from the Storage Unit
d. Smoke of any description is noted emanating from the Storage Unit
17. The Occupier may not use the Storage Unit as a makeshift office at any given point of time during the use of the Storage Unit

18. On the Mezzanine - floor, the weight restriction per Square Meter is 500 kg. Nonconformance to this limitation may result in structural failure and bodily harm, for which the Company shall not be liable in any manner. The Company retains the right to evict and/or financially penalize the Occupier if there is nonconformance to this condition covering weight restrictions.
19. The Company offers Storage Units for Storage purposes in good faith and trust. Kindly leave your Storage Unit(s) as clean as you would expect to receive them.

20. The Company may recommend third-party packaging and removal vendors to Occupier’s for packing and transportation of their materials however for avoidance of doubt, the Company is responsible for the quality or method of the work and cannot be held accountable in any manner whatsoever. By agreeing to use the third-party vendors in the first instance before commencement of work, the Occupier thereby unequivocally indemnifies the Company from any liability
21.The Company requires fourteen (14) calendar days of processing to return the Refundable Security Deposit from the day the Storage Unit(s) is vacated in a satisfactory manner
22.The Storage Unit should be returned to the Company in leasable condition upon check- out
23.The Storage Unit shall only be accessed by the authorised personnel of the Company during the Term of the Agreement
24.The Occupier shall always ensure the safety of its staff
25.The Occupier shall ensure that other occupants of the Premise are not harmed by any of the Good’s materials in the Storage Unit of the Occupier
26.At no given point in time, the Occupier can give access to non-authorized personnel to the Storage Unit without the prior approval of the Company
27. Improvement suggestions are welcome at all times. Please ask our reception for a form.
